article_title: Church of England approves women bishops in historic vote
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

CANTERBURY, England (RNS) The first woman bishop could be named by the end of the year with the appointment of at least three additional women sometime in 2015. In parts of Africa, it may take longer.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Beliefs, Africa, Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby, Christian, Church of England, Episcopal Church, General Synod, Protestant, women bishops
